metadata.title: CVE-2020-25592 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In SaltStack Salt through 3002, salt-netapi improperly validates eauthcredentials and tokens. A user can bypass authentication and invoke SaltSSH.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
